Events that occurred on 13 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 121.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing letter 295b.
1979 - Mythcon 10 in San Jose, California.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Mann Centre in Philadelphia.
2006 - The Lord of the Rings: The White Council is announced.
2004 - Tolkien Thing VII in Hohensolms, Hohenahr, Germany.
2005 - Tolkien Thing VI in Hohensolms, Hohenahr, Germany.
2007 - Tolkien Thing IX in Diez, Germany.
2008 - Tolkien Thing X in Rieneck, Germany.
2013 - Mythcon 44 at Michigan State University, East Lansing.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 1944:
In the last stages of the Disaster of the Morannon, Minohtar is slain by an arrow, and his forces are routed.
EÃ¤rnil arrives at the battlefield, and is victorious in the Battle of the Camp.
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
